title: un gold 1 vuole uno smurf bronze 5 e muore intenzionalmente in ogni ranked.
body:
Cosa posso fare per far bannare un account che ha ammesso in chat post game di morire intenzionalmente per avere un smurf bronze 5 essendo in main gold 1?

ecco la chat post game:
XTheBlackRoseXx joined the lobby
LN WDQK joined the lobby
JackyPrince joined the lobby
Bringitonxx joined the lobby
JANNA joined the lobby
Branjo11 joined the lobby
romme86 joined the lobby
Bringitonxx
RYLO
:  GG WP
Roodman joined the lobby
xXxmouzlitaxXx joined the lobby
Bringitonxx
RYLO
:  I TOLD YOU GUYS
blackzapp joined the lobby
Bringitonxx
RYLO
:  WE GOT THIS
blackzapp left the lobby
Branjo11 left the lobby
romme86:  tresh got this
romme86:  TO YOU
Bringitonxx left the lobby
romme86:  you cant win without troll
xXTheBlackRoseXx left the lobby
JANNA:  well, having a smurf bronze 5 acc. isn't easy xD
JackyPrince left the lobby
JANNA:  sry guys :P
Roodman left the lobby
romme86:  you ulted minions
JANNA:  u get reported for your toxicity btw
romme86:  you get killed farming top
JANNA:  that's the point
JANNA:  lmao
JANNA:  no other way
JANNA:  i need a b5 acc
romme86:  you died nearly half our kills
JANNA:  :|
JANNA:  yeah
JANNA:  and
JANNA:  this yasuo
romme86:  i never flamed you
JANNA:  tilted anyway
JANNA:  ROFL
romme86:  i just state facts
romme86:  you are not bad
xXxmouzlitaxXx left the lobby
JANNA:  that's flaming
JANNA:  btw
romme86:  you die on purpose
JANNA:  flaming = getting agry
JANNA:  nah
JANNA:  not on purpose
romme86:  i am not angry
romme86:  i wanna know
JANNA:  when u say "i go feed" and u die unmder tower
JANNA:  that's on purpose
romme86:  if you are bad or you troll us
JANNA:  im gold 1 on main xD
JANNA:  as I said I need a b5 acc
JANNA:  lel
romme86:  that mean you troll
romme86:  why you ulted under tower?
JANNA:  still not aganist rules...
romme86:  i was near you
JANNA:  god...
JANNA:  i repeat:
JANNA:  NEED TO BE BRONZE 5
LN WDQK left the lobby
JANNA:  need to lose 10/10
JANNA:  ranking matches
romme86:  yet you are g1...
JANNA:  on my main
JANNA:  not on this acc.
JANNA:  goddam
JANNA:  D:
romme86:  so i lost this
JANNA:  yeh but
JANNA:  5 ppl
romme86:  cause you have to go to b1
JANNA:  won it
JANNA:  :|
romme86:  you never get there like this
JANNA:  im sry bro
JANNA:  shit happens
romme86:  because you will be banned
JANNA:  ik
romme86:  i know
JANNA:  hmm
JANNA:  nah I won't ^^
romme86:  shit happens any way
romme86:  if you do this
JANNA:  Did nothing aganist rules mate
romme86:  you ruined 9 poeple game
JANNA:  you can read it
romme86:  even if they won
romme86:  is not a good game for them
JANNA:  hmmmmmmmm
JANNA:  yasuo flaming 24/7
JANNA:  that
JANNA:  ruined a game
JANNA:  not a guy randonmly feeding
JANNA:  lel
JANNA:  still
JANNA:  why im wasting time?
JANNA:  bb <3
romme86:  your behavior is still not sportly
JANNA left the lobby

_____
_Edit by mod: Il name e shame non è consentito._

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=romme86,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=WQsG2Io4,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-25T22:54:57.616+0000)
>
> Cosa posso fare per far bannare un account che ha ammesso in chat post game di morire intenzionalmente per avere un smurf bronze 5 essendo in main gold 1?

Puoi segnalarlo con l'apposita funzione presente nella schermata di fine partita.
Qui non ci possiamo fare niente purtroppo, come ha detto il bro sotto, rimuovi il nome del flamer, sennò finiscono per punire te :(
Cancella i nomi e scrivi ad esempio tizio X e tizio Y perché potrebbero cancellare una parte del thread per name & shame
